item.title: How the #$@& Do I Use an API?! - Wikipedia API Basics
item.description:
Wikipedia API Basics 1. So... What's an API? 2. There's an API For That! 3. Okay, I Know What an API Is...Now What? 4. Let's Do It! 5. It worked! (Hopefully)
How the #$@& Do I Use an API?! I'm taking a break from the WordPress development topic to delve into APIs. (Yay!) I'll be using the Wikipedia API for this example. 1. So... What's an API? APIs—application programming interfaces—are the current standard in utilizing information and technologies on the web.
